summary.title: Revenue Growth vs. Headcount Growth
summary.description: In FY23 P2, the value was 32% vs 36%
points: The $ value of staffed revenue has increased by $2M
There is a slight increase in the headcount from previous period
Net staffed revenue is $23.8M and headcount is 1K in P3
Unitypoint Health and Nationwide Mutual Insurance are some of the larger accounts with >$1M revenue and >7K client hours in FY23

summary.title: Projects not meeting SoC benchmark
summary.description: Citigroup and Energy transfers are both above the target SoC

summary.title: Offshore EM (managed)
summary.description: The $ value of Offshore EM ($1.4M) and Managed Revenue ($2.1M) has increased by 13% (EM) and 16% (revenue) in FY23 P2 compared to FY22 P2
points: Offshore contributes to 13% of margin and 9% of the overall CBO revenue
Liberty Mutual, Vanguard Group and Delta airlines are some of the projects having >$200K offshore revenue and >80% offshore EM in FY23

summary.title: SmartStarts
summary.description: 3 out of 7 relevant projects (with avg consulting revenue of $1M) have used Smarts Starts in FY23 P3. Details in SmartStarts Adoption slide

summary.title: OT staffed projects not using USI
summary.description: There are 2 projects not using USI OT with >4K hours in FY23 â€“ Vanguard (Retail Modernization) and Edward Jones (Digital Enablers). Vanguard has presence in all offerings across USI while Edward Jones has no USI presence in any offerings.
